import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import logo from './Img/logo.png' import comp from './Vedio/comp.mp4' import Hambur from './Img/menu.png' import Imagesroll from './Imagesroll' import Tippy from '@tippyjs/react' import 'tippy.js/dist/tippy.css' import Clock from './Clock' function Navbar() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [openabout, setOpenabout] = useState(false) const [openreasearch, setOpenreasearch] = useState(false) const [openpupil, setOpenpupil] = useState(false); const [openacad, setOpenacad] = useState(false); const [opencheck, setOpencheck] = useState(false) const [width, setWidth] = useState(getWindowSize()); const navref = useRef(); // const [offtop, setOfftop] = useState(null) const myref = useRef(); const getListsize = () => { setWidth(getWindowSize); } // const get offtop =() =>{ // var offtoptop = navref.current.getBoundingClientRect().top; // return offtoptop; // } var offtop; const Handlescroll = () => { offtop = navref.current.getBoundingClientRect().top; } useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', Handlescroll); window.addEventListener('resize', getListsize); return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', getListsize); }; }, []); return ( <>
